whatWeDo.sectionDesc: The MITRE SAF brings together the right technologies, methods, and skills to meet the security needs of today's developers and operators.

items.desc: Produce detailed security testing data throughout development

items.name: Hardening

items.name: Training
items.desc: Learn how to write effective tests and apply them to the team's pipeline

whatWeDo.sectionDesc: MITRE has developed a workflow for generating good security data - and acting on it.

whatWeDo.sectionDesc: MITRE has developed a toolchain to support secure development.
